title: Workshop: Abstract Expressionist Printmaking—SOLD OUT
description:
>This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.

>Saturday, June 2
1:00pm-4:00pm

class="MsoNoSpacing">Take inspiration from Helen Frankenthaler: The Romance of a New Medium, and explore color, shape, and composition by designing, carving, and printing your own linocut. Materials are provided and no experience is necessary. Please note that this workshop is a repeat of the workshop hosted on May 5, 2018.

>Click here to see all upcoming classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu.

Classes are recommended for ages 16 and up.

>To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

>Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
